title: Iron.Monkey.1993.Uncut.HK.Version.1080p.BluRay.x264.mkv
description:
Since the mutilated Miramax cut of the film was all I could find anywhere on the internet, I now uploaded the original Hong Kong version myself.

Summary:
A masked thief steals from the corrupt authorities and gives to the poor while a renowned hero is forced to hunt him down until a new and powerful foe units both martial artists in their righteous cause.


Directed by Yuen Woo-ping

Written and produced by Tsui Hark

Starring Donnie Yen, Yu Rongguang, Yen Shi-kwan


Imdb              : <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1091191" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1091191</a>
Source            :  Retail Hong Kong Blu-Ray
Audio Track 1     :  Cantonese 5.1, Flac Format
Audio Track 2     :  Cantonese 5.1, AAC Format
Runtime           :  01:29:38
Aspect Ratio      :  1,85 : 1
Resolution        :  1920 X 1080
Subtitle Track 1  :  English
Subtitle Track 2  :  Chinese


Note (1): Although Cantonese is the film's original language, you will notice some dubbing. This is due to the fact that both the Cantonese and Mandarin speaking actors recorded their dialogue in their respective language, which was then dubbed for either the Hong Kong or Mainland China release. No version exists that does not contain any dubbing.


Note (2): Since my upload speed is very limited, initial seeding will take quite some time. Any help is appreciated.
